participant_1.background:
I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years.
I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog.
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.
sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning.
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

participant_2.background:
I celebrated my last birthday by creating a series of art pieces to share with my friends and family about the importance of animal welfare.
i do not have children.
I want to share my photography with the world.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
I spend my spare time doing solitary activities like reading and hiking.

content.text: Good, thanks for asking! What about you?
I am doing well, thanks!  How was your birthday?
It was wonderful! I spent time with my friends and family and created a series of art pieces to share with them about the importance of animal welfare.
That sounds wonderful!  I'm glad you had a great time.
Thanks!  What is your favorite thing to do in your spare time?
I like to read, hike, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your time!  I love to read and hike too.  My favorite thing to do in my spare time is share my photography with the world.
Oh wow, that's amazing!  I would love to see some of your work if you're willing to share.
Of course!  Here's a link to my website: [website].
Wow, your photography is beautiful!  I love the way you capture the natural beauty of the world.
Thank you so much!  I'm glad you enjoy it.
I do!  I'm also a big fan of comic books and animals.  What are some of your favorite comic books?
I love the X-Men comics!  I'm also a big fan of Batman and Superman.
Those are great choices!  I'm a big fan of the X-Men too.  Who is your favorite X-Man?
My favorite X-Man is Wolverine.  He's such a badass!  What about you?
I love Wolverine too!  He's my favorite X-Man too
